title: Newly Built 5/2.5 + Huge Loft Ready NOW 2542 sqft - JARRELL
posting_body: Niki Prekas, License #564065, Gamma Realty, LLC DBA Red Kanguru
Rare 5 bedroom available in the newly built community Stonebridge Crossing!
The Travis plan offers you the space and upgrades that make life more comfortable!

This beautiful two-story home has 5 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms with a huge upstairs 2nd living area/loft for your kids or friends to enjoy on their own time when they come over - perfect as a grownup getaway too.
In addition, this new construction comes standard equipped not only in high quality materials but also designer details such as granite countertops and luxury vinyl plank flooring.
Residents at Stonebridge Crossing enjoy incredible community amenities.
Inside this beautiful community, residents enjoy a park with a children’s playground and covered picnic pavilion with barbeque pits perfect for grilling out with your friends and neighbors.
Additionally, Stonebridge Crossing has plenty of open green space, a soccer field, walking trails and a dog park for your furry family members!
Jarrell Elementary: 1615 County Rd 313, Jarrell Tx 76537
Igo Elementary: 1601 County Rd 314, Jarrell Tx 76537
Jarrell Middle School:101 E Avenue F, Jarrell Tx 76537
Jarrell High School: 1100 FM 487, Jarrell Tx 76537
Pet fee if applicable: $350 for first pet, $300 for second
Pet rent if applicable: $15/month for first pet, $10/month for second pet
3 X the rent in gross income
No housing debt (broken lease/eviction/multiple late pays)
If under 600, please let me know
Same floor plan, same finishes, same size.
